channel.title: [PI] Does anybody have a command like ::grim or ::bunny
channel.description:
HEY so basicaly i need a command that turns me into the grim reaper. or easter bunny plz REPLY REP++
I have got a command called ::santa but i was wondering if u have ::bunny or ::grim
TY
REP++ for everyone that helps me

Oh yes sorry im kinda new to mopar and thanks for the idea

item.title: [PI] Does anybody have a command like ::grim or ::bunny
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“shufflebros, post:1, topic:432776”]HEY so basicaly i need a command that turns me into the grim reaper. or easter bunny plz REPLY REP++

I have got a command called ::santa but i was wondering if u have ::bunny or ::grim

TY

             REP++ for everyone that helps me[/quote]

First you can’t rep with 10 rep. Second just copy the santa code and change the npcid you need to be turned in.
